description: Heterogeneity Human Activity Recognition dataset. 9 users performing 6 activities with heterogeneous devices (Nexus 4, Galaxy S3, S3 Mini, LG G Watch). Triaxial accelerometer and gyroscope data.

channels.name: acc_x
channels.description: Smartphone/smartwatch accelerometer X-axis (variable device and placement)

channels.name: acc_y
channels.description: Smartphone/smartwatch accelerometer Y-axis (variable device and placement)

channels.name: acc_z
channels.description: Smartphone/smartwatch accelerometer Z-axis (variable device and placement)

channels.name: gyro_x
channels.description: Smartphone/smartwatch gyroscope X-axis (variable device and placement)

channels.name: gyro_y
channels.description: Smartphone/smartwatch gyroscope Y-axis (variable device and placement)

channels.name: gyro_z
channels.description: Smartphone/smartwatch gyroscope Z-axis (variable device and placement)
